snippet: Social media sabotage is in high gear in Texas’ later-than-usual primary, from fake Twitter feeds to deceptive Web site domains to allegations of e-mail and Facebook forgery.
lead_paragraph: Social media sabotage is in high gear in Texas’ later-than-usual primary, from fake Twitter feeds to deceptive Web site domains to allegations of e-mail and Facebook forgery.

headline.seo: In Texas, Political Chicanery Finds a Home on the Web
headline.main: Bashing the Candidates With Their Own Names
headline.print_headline: Bashing the Candidates With Their Own Names
